unnormalised: Hey guys, any updates on Virat? Heard he twisted his ankle during the Delhi match. Hope it's nothing serious, maybe just a bit of rest and some haldi doodh. Dr. Sharma said it's a minor sprain, thank God! Recover soon, Kohli! We need you back on the field! Rs. 500 says he'll be back in shape within 2 weeks, playing at the Wankhede. Heard they're building a new rehab facility, 2000 sq ft, near the NCA.
normalised: Hey guys, any updates on Virat? Heard he twisted his ankle during the Delhi match. Hope it's nothing serious, maybe just a bit of rest and some haldi doodh. Doctor Sharma said it's a minor sprain, thank God! Recover soon, Kohli! We need you back on the field! Rupee five hundred says he will be back in shape within two weeks, playing at the Wankhede. Heard they are building a new rehab facility, two thousand square feet, near the N C A.
